title: my club glitches 0 people online and tag doesn't show outside of game

replies.body: I'm not familiar with the issue here, but it sounds like a potential connection problem.  Are other members of your club able to see other players online?  What's the name and tag of your club?  Let me know!

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=IE8TXlsr,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-11-15T18:02:29.079+0000)
>
> I'm not familiar with the issue here, but it sounds like a potential connection problem.  Are other members of your club able to see other players online?  What's the name and tag of your club?  Let me know!

tag Tree!
name iverns club

not a connection issue because it's always like this recently
i don't talk with other members so idk

Thanks for the follow up!  Unfortunately, I wasn't able to find any issues on my side.  Hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so our tech team can take a closer look.   Attach some screenshots to your ticket as well to help offer better visibility.  We'll reply back as soon as we can!
